B

BitBooleanArray - Class in OneBitBoolean
It is a custom implementation that works similar to boolean but it stores a boolean in 1 bit instead of consuming a whole byte.
BitBooleanArray(int) - Constructor for class OneBitBoolean.BitBooleanArray
Parameterized constructor This creates an array of n booleans specified by size All the elements of the created array are 'false' by default.
BitBooleanArray(BitBooleanArray) - Constructor for class OneBitBoolean.BitBooleanArray
A copy constructor.
BitBooleanIndexOutOfBoundsException - Exception in OneBitBoolean
It is an exception thrown when element out of bounds is attempted to be accessed.
BitBooleanIndexOutOfBoundsException(int, int) - Constructor for exception OneBitBoolean.BitBooleanIndexOutOfBoundsException
